column4: hey is there a way on the live cd to deleteparions of ubuntu i made a mistke and need to reinstall
the gparted tool, or use fdisk, or cfdisk if they are on the live cd.
you can NOT modify a partition if its mounted.
i always use the gparted live cd.   that way none get mounted..  You could use the command line tools I guess.. or force the unmount..
